TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {16965=Time: 4:11PM, 10257=FSF Urge Clubs To Reduce Away Ticket Prices (Friday July 17 2015), 17012=Date:Thursday October 19 2006, 19403=Sunderland have signed Derby centre-back, Lewin Nyatanga on loan until January. Roy Keane snapped up the 18-year-old Welshman today, in a bid to ease his defensive crisis. The Black Cats' defence has been pitiful for the last few games, strangely similar to their Tyneside neighbours. Nyatanga was Derby's young player of the season - last season - after making 25 appearances for The Rams. He made his Wales debut in March versus Paraguay and recently played against Brazil in a friendly., 10868=Defoe On The Mark For Black Cats (Thursday July 23 2015), 9424=Sunderland Complete Dutch International Signing.
